rules.title: Provide Alt Text for Images
rules.description: All informative images must have concise and descriptive alt text that conveys the same meaning as the image.
rules.example_good: Alt text: 'Diagram showing the login workflow with three steps: Enter credentials, verify email, access dashboard.'

rules.title: Ensure Sufficient Color Contrast
rules.description: Use color combinations that meet WCAG contrast ratio guidelines (4.5:1 for normal text, 3:1 for large text).
rules.example_good: Dark blue text on a white background.
rules.example_bad: Light gray text on a white background.

rules.title: Do Not Convey Information by Color Alone
rules.description: Ensure that meaning is not dependent solely on color; use text labels, patterns, or shapes as additional indicators.
rules.example_good: Error messages are in red and preceded by an 'Error:' label.
rules.example_bad: Error messages are only in red without any text label.

rules.title: Use Descriptive Link Text
rules.description: Hyperlink text should clearly describe the destination or purpose, avoiding vague labels like 'click here.'
rules.example_good: See the 'Installation Guide' for setup steps.

rules.title: Ensure Keyboard Navigation Support
rules.description: All interactive elements should be reachable and operable via keyboard without requiring a mouse.
rules.example_good: Tab key moves sequentially through links and buttons in a logical order.
rules.example_bad: Some form fields can only be selected with a mouse.

rules.title: Use Clear, Simple Language
rules.description: Write in plain language to make content understandable for a wide audience, including non-native speakers.
rules.example_good: Press the power button to start the device.
rules.example_bad: Initiate device activation via the primary actuation control.

rules.title: Provide Captions and Transcripts for Multimedia
rules.description: All videos and audio files should have accurate captions and/or transcripts to ensure accessibility.
rules.example_good: Video includes synchronized captions and a downloadable transcript.
rules.example_bad: Video contains only audio without captions.

rules.title: Avoid Flashes and Rapid Animations
rules.description: Do not use content that flashes more than three times per second or causes seizures.
rules.example_bad: Flashing red banner that blinks rapidly.
